title: New Renovated 3-Bedroom Apartment!!!
neighborhood: Medford, near Assembly Row & Fellsway Plaza!
posting_body: Newly renovated 3-bedroom apartment in a fantastic Medford, MA neighborhood!
This is a spacious, sunny, and modern 3-bedroom apartment currently undergoing renovations including new kitchen & bathrooms!
The unit features central heating/AC, hardwood floors, an open living room/kitchen, and a granite island counter.
Internet/WiFi and water/sewer INCLUDED in rent.
Plenty of street parking is available, as well as off-street and garage spaces!
All bedrooms are large and about the same size, each with large closets and two large windows!
All tenants (or their co-signer if student/young professional), must meet the following requirements:
- Monthly income for the unit must be 3x the monthly rent
- Must pass background & credit check (600+ credit)
- Pets are permitted on a case-by-case basis.
